Fractional-reserve #bitcoin suppresses #BTC's price. It offsets BTC's real-world scarcity by creating unbacked claims to BTC (ie, more paper claims to BTC than there are real BTC), causing BTC's price to drop, all else equal. We have entered the era of fractional-reserve bitcoin.  https://t.co/TBaJRPKCkm
